subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: There have been U.S. Open champions from Australia, Argentina, South Africa and New Zealand since 1970 but none from Europe, despite several near misses by golfers from Britain.
snippet: There have been U.S. Open champions from Australia, Argentina, South Africa and New Zealand since 1970 but none from Europe, despite several near misses by golfers from Britain.
